subject: Re: [junit] Passing command line arguments
msgSnippet: ... I had this question queued up for the FAQ and just updated the official online version: http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#runners_8 Thanks to
messageBody:

online version:

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#runners_8

Thanks to Noah Green for originally asking that it be added.

Mike
